requirements.title: Password Requirements
requirements.notCompromised: Must not be a known compromised password

securityCheck.title: Enhanced Password Security
securityCheck.description: Your password will be checked against known data breaches to ensure your account remains secure.

validation.compromised: This password has been found in data breaches. Please choose a different one.

notice.passwordChanged: Your password has been updated successfully.
notice.accountSecured: Your account is now more secure.
